meta.name: description
meta.content: Hemet Unified School District is a K-12 school district in Hemet, California which covers Hemet, East Hemet, Valle Vista, Anza, Winchester, and Idyllwild.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Hemet Unified School District, Hemet Unified, Hemet USD, Hemet Schools

article.div: Live Audio Stream for April 21, 2020 Board Meeting Placeholder Photo

h3.a: Live Audio Stream for April 21, 2020 Board Meeting
New Website brought to you by Hemet USD!

div.div: Please explore the enrichment resources on our new site, www.hemetlearnstogether.org. This website will host online resources and enrichment packets for HUSD students and families.

h3.a: School Closures for Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Precautions

div.div: Updated and informative letters about Novel Coronavirus.

article.div: Jennifer Valdez smiling for the camera.

h3.a: Faculty Focus Friday Employee for Alternative Sites

div.div: Staff members recognized by their school site for being an asset to their school's community.

article.div: Yudhister Kumar, Mason Carey, Rory Jensen, and Natalie Jensen with their Spelling Bee Awards.

div.div: Students from across the district participated in the 24th annual Spelling Bee. Yudhister Kumar, Western Center Academy student, will represent HUSD in the County Spelling Bee.

article.div: Cawston staff and students on the field in the shape of a heart.

div.div: Cawston students and staff used the week to spread joy and kindness on campus.

h3.a: Career Explorations Expanded to Additional Middle Schools

div.div: Career Explorations will be expanded to Diamond Valley and Acacia Middle next school year.

article.div: Lyle Radford in front of the district office building.

div.div: Lyle Radford, former Security Supervisor, was promoted to the new Director of District Security.

article.div: Darlene Sloyer standing on Western Center Academy's campus
